程序包 net.neoforged.neoforge.registries

类 DeferredBlock<T extends Block>

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.neoforge.registries.DeferredHolder<Block,T>
net.neoforged.neoforge.registries.DeferredBlock<T>
类型参数:
T - The specific Block type.
所有已实现的接口:
Supplier<T>, Holder<Block>, ItemLike, IHolderExtension<Block>, IWithData<Block>
直接已知子类:
DeferredBlockBuilder
public class DeferredBlock<T extends Block> extends DeferredHolder<Block,T> implements ItemLike
Special DeferredHolder for Blocks that implements ItemLike.
